tool.name: SAGA.imagery_classification.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayONE False isArrayONE_LUT False isArrayONE_LUT_MIN False isArrayONE_LUT_MAX False isArrayONE_LUT_NAM False isArrayTWO False isArrayTWO_LUT False isArrayTWO_LUT_MIN False isArrayTWO_LUT_MAX False isArrayTWO_LUT_NAM False output_data_COMBINED $output_data_COMBINED output_data_CONFUSION $output_data_CONFUSION output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES output_data_SUMMARY $output_data_SUMMARY name SAGA.imagery_classification.2 ONE $ONE ONE_LUT $ONE_LUT ONE_LUT_MIN $ONE_LUT_MIN ONE_LUT_MAX $ONE_LUT_MAX ONE_LUT_NAM $ONE_LUT_NAM TWO $TWO TWO_LUT $TWO_LUT TWO_LUT_MIN $TWO_LUT_MIN TWO_LUT_MAX $TWO_LUT_MAX TWO_LUT_NAM $TWO_LUT_NAM NOCHANGE $NOCHANGE NODATA $NODATA OUTPUT $OUTPUT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_COMBINED $OutputSection_COMBINED.outputType_COMBINED transmissionMode_COMBINED $OutputSection_COMBINED.transmissionMode_COMBINED outputType_CONFUSION $OutputSection_CONFUSION.outputType_CONFUSION transmissionMode_CONFUSION $OutputSection_CONFUSION.transmissionMode_CONFUSION outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES outputType_SUMMARY $OutputSection_SUMMARY.outputType_SUMMARY transmissionMode_SUMMARY $OutputSection_SUMMARY.transmissionMode_SUMMARY

param.name: ONE
param.label: Classification 1
param.help: Classification 1 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: ONE_LUT
param.label: Look-up Table
param.help: Look-up Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ONE_LUT_MIN
param.label: Value
param.help: Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ONE_LUT_MAX
param.label: Value (Maximum)
param.help: Value (Maximum) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ONE_LUT_NAM
param.label: Name
param.help: Name The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TWO
param.label: Classification 2
param.help: Classification 2 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: TWO_LUT
param.label: Look-up Table
param.help: Look-up Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TWO_LUT_MIN
param.label: Value
param.help: Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TWO_LUT_MAX
param.label: Value (Maximum)
param.help: Value (Maximum) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TWO_LUT_NAM
param.label: Name
param.help: Name The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_COMBINED
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_CONFUSION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_SUMMARY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Compares two classified grids and creates a confusion matrix and derived coefficients as well as the combinations of both classifications as new grid. Grid classes have to be defined with a look-up table and values of both grids must match each other for the subsequent comparison. A typical application is a change detection analysis based on land cover classification of satellite imagery.
